title: Bitcoin’s biggest booster Michael Saylor fights to stave off an $8 billion collapse and being the first major crypto domino to fall
description: A rule change could force Saylor's company to sell some of its $650 billion holdings—but crypto veterans say Strategy will be just fine.
content: Billionaire Michael Saylor has been in tight spots before but nothing like this. The share price of Saylors firm Strategy, which owns over 3% of the worlds Bitcoin, is down dramatically. Worse, the c… [+11846 chars]
